Runs the motion detection algorithm.

Parameters:
NewImage The "new" frame
OldImage The "old" frame
Threshold The threshold used to detect changes in the image
DetectionColor Color to display changes in the images as
Returns:
A bitmap indicating where changes between frames have occurred overlayed on top of the new image.
